title: Quiet Bunny's Many Colors
description: The brilliantly colorful follow-up to Lisa McCue's best-selling Quiet Bunny ! Quiet Bunny loves the bright colors of the yellow ducks, green frogs, and blue jays—everything but his own mousy brown fur. It takes the help of a wise old owl for Bunny to realize that it's the rainbow of colors—including his own—that makes the world so beautiful.
author: Lisa McCue
